name: X-Ray VR Helmet Simulator Joke
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true VR.
X-Ray VR Helmet Simulator Joke - Always wanted to see everything in the X-rays as a superhero? You want to try to scan the clothes or passers-by as a joke?
Or look through walls?
Try our simulator X-Ray VR helmet app! Show your friends how cool your phone as a virtual reality helmet X-rays!
Scan your friends jokingly through clothes!
Play your friends and family do a cat scan or any other thing! Attention! This is not a real virtual reality helmet and an X-ray simulator only emulator that is designed for fun and entertainment! It is safe for your health!
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true X-Ray.
Leave us your feedback and assessment, and we'll make our app even better!
